name: vbl-pc
description: This is a simple website project to showcase the services of the company VBL PC. The goal of the project was to revamp the current website to have a clean and accessible page on the web to represent the company and get more visibility on search engines. VBL PC is a local computer repair business, so I made sure to respect three points : - Make the navigation as simple as possible (one page, no complex features) - Display the contact info as clearly as possible - Embed a section to display the localization of the company on a map
